overview: A small town’s eccentric, self-proclaimed brilliant dramatist brings art and passion into the lives of three young people, each of whom, immersed in individual dilemmas, had never had any interest in art. She ultimately leads them to create their own ridiculous though earnest Shakespearean theatrical troupe, forging a new bond of family among themselves.
tagline: A small town’s eccentric, self-proclaimed brilliant dramatist brings art and passion into the lives of three young people, each of whom, immersed in individual dilemmas, had never had any interest in art.
title: Mere Oblivion
